testcase.name: creation succesfull with correct username and password
can login with succesfully generated account
creation fails with correct username and too short password
creation fails with correct username and pasword consisting of letters

failure.message: Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered

testcase.failure:
Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered
scenario creation fails with correct username and pasword consisting of letters given command new user is selected when a valid username and password consisting of letters are entered then new user is not be registered to system

failure.message: Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered

testcase.name: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword
can not login with account that is not succesfully created

failure.message: Step "new credentials do not allow logging in to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >, username:, password:, logged in, >] doesn't contain wrong username or password

testcase.failure:
Step "new credentials do not allow logging in to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >, username:, password:, logged in, >] doesn't contain wrong username or password
